mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE( (SELECT SUM(quantity) FROM Purchase WHERE productId = #{productId}), 0 ) - COALESCE( (SELECT SUM(quantity) FROM StockAdjustment WHERE productId = #{productId}), 0 ) - COALESCE( (SELECT SUM(quantity) FROM Sales_Item WHERE productId = #{productId}), 0 ) AS availableQty FROM DUAL

SELECT purchaseId, productId, codeBId, createdAt, quantity, notes FROM ( SELECT p.purchaseId AS purchaseId, p.productId AS productId, p.codeBId AS codeBId, p.createdAt AS createdAt, p.quantity AS quantity, p.notes AS notes, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY p.createdAt DESC, p.purchaseId DESC) AS rn FROM PURCHASE p WHERE p.productId = #{productId} ) WHERE rn > #{offset} AND rn <= #{offset} + #{size} ORDER BY createdAt DESC, purchaseId DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Purchase ( purchaseId, productId, codeBId, createdAt, quantity, notes ) VALUES ( PURCHASE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{productId}, #{codeBId}, SYSDATE, #{quantity}, #{notes, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
INSERT INTO StockAdjustment ( adjustmentId, productId, codeBId, createdAt, quantity, notes ) VALUES ( STOCK_ADJUSTMENT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{productId}, #{codeBId}, SYSDATE, #{quantity}, #{notes} )
